channel.title: people on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in people on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-22
item.description: Apple Reportedly Completes Production Tests for AR/VR Headset (1 minute read) Apple has completed key production tests for its long-rumored augmented and virtual reality headset.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-07
item.description: Samsung takes a stab at its own immersive metaverse store (3 minute read) Samsung 837X is an immersive metaverse experience that will be open in Decentraland for a limited time.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-13
item.description: Samsung’s working on a rollable smartwatch with a camera (4 minute read) Samsung filed a patent in June for a Galaxy Watch with a rollable screen.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-26
item.description: Adorable redesigned emoji—including Clippy—included in latest Windows 11 update (2 minute read) Microsoft will add redesigned emoji in the next Windows 11 update.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-03
item.description: Microsoft Teams enters the metaverse race with 3D avatars and immersive meetings (4 minute read) Microsoft is integrating Mesh directly into Microsoft Teams.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-28
item.description: LinkedIn rolls out its freelance services marketplace globally after picking up 2M users in smaller US beta (4 minute read) LinkedIn is opening up its Service Marketplace, a service that lets freelancers advertise to those looking to hire people for short-term engagements.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-07
item.description: Twitch source code and creator payouts reportedly part of massive leak (2 minute read) An anonymous poster released a 125GB torrent on 4chan containing the entirety of Twitch’s platform and client source code commit history, details regarding creator payouts, an unreleased Steam competitor from Amazon Game Studios, and other code and software related to the platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-25
item.description: Airbnb says it plans to temporarily house 20,000 Afghan refugees (2 minute read) Airbnb will house 20,000 Afghan refugees around the world in the properties listed on its platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-17
item.description: US investigates Autopilot after 11 Teslas crashed into emergency vehicles (4 minute read) US government regulators are opening an investigation into Tesla’s Autopilot system.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-16
item.description: Excerpt: How Google bought Android—according to folks in the room (12 minute read) A new book from a long-time Android engineer offers a behind-the-scenes look at early Android development.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-27
item.description: Netflix is reportedly developing a live-action Pokémon series (2 minute read) Netflix is in the early stages of developing a live-action Pokémon TV series.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-18
item.description: Here’s what’s inside Google’s first-ever retail store (3 minute read) Google has opened its first-ever permanent retail location in New York City.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-17
item.description: Apple has reportedly considered launching its own primary healthcare service (2 minute read) Apple has plans to launch a subscription-based healthcare service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-16
item.description: Windows 11 leak reveals new UI, Start menu, and more (3 minute read) An early version of Windows 11 has leaked online ahead of its unveiling on June 24.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-15
item.description: Apple Watch model for extreme sports reportedly in development (1 minute read) This year’s Apple Watch, likely called the Apple Watch Series 7, will have a faster processor, an updated screen, and ultra-wideband functionality.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-14
item.description: Amazon details new warehouse robots, ‘Ernie’ and ‘Bert’ (2 minute read) Amazon is testing out two new robots, Ernie and Bert, to try to reduce strenuous movements for workers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-26
item.description: Google launches its third major operating system, Fuchsia (3 minute read) Fuchsia is Google’s latest operating system for the Google Home Hub.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-06
item.description: Facebook takes on Nextdoor with Neighborhoods tool (3 minute read) Facebook is rolling out a new feature called Neighborhoods in four US cities and Canada.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-30
item.description: Spotify launches redesigned ‘Your Library’ with new grid view, dynamic filters, more for iOS/Android (2 minute read) A new update for the Spotify app brings a redesigned Your Library tab, with a new Grid view, dynamic filters, improved sorting, and more.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-20
item.description: Microsoft’s ‘Netflix-for-gaming’ service launches on iPhone and PC this week (2 minute read) Microsoft’s Xbox Cloud Gaming service will roll out in beta on iOS and PCs this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-02
item.description: Apple will use Tesla’s ‘megapack’ batteries at its California solar farm (3 minute read) Apple will use Tesla battery packs at its big battery storage project in Northern California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-01
item.description: Apple adds two brand new Siri voices and will no longer default to a female or male voice in iOS (3 minute read) Siri will no longer default to a female voice in English.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-25
item.description: Pfizer trials new pill that could stop early-stage Covid in its tracks (3 minute read) Pfizer has started stage one clinical trials on an oral pill designed to be an early intervention for Covid-19.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-11
item.description: Leaked Renders Claim to Show Third-Generation AirPods Design (1 minute read) A set of renders claiming to showcase the design of the next generation of AirPods has been leaked from a supplier.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-22
item.description: Samsung imagines how its first AR glasses might look in these leaked concept videos (2 minute read) Samsung recently showed off a basic set of image-projecting goggles at CES 2020.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-12
item.description: Samsung’s CES 2021 robots will clean your house and pour you a glass of wine (6 minute read) Samsung unveiled three new robots at its virtual CES press conference on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-04
item.description: Samsung officially confirms Galaxy S21 event for January 14th (1 minute read) Samsung will announce its latest lineup of Galaxy flagship phones on January 14th.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-20
item.description: Amazon focuses on another use for Alexa as Echo Frames smart glasses are now available (2 minute read) Amazon is moving its Echo Frames smart glasses from invite-only to general availability.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-17
item.description: Foxconn allegedly testing folding iPhone, projected Sept. 2022 release (1 minute read) According to supply chain reports, Foxconn is testing a folding iPhone for Apple.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-02
item.description: People Are Jailbreaking Used Teslas to Get the Features They Expect (5 minute read) Tesla will sometimes claw back software upgrades from used cars, removing features that owners had paid for at the time of sale.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-13
item.description: The Pentagon Wants Elon Musk to Yeet Cargo Around the Planet In an Hour (2 minute read) The Pentagon has contracted SpaceX to develop rockets to deliver packages around the planet in under an hour.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-02
item.description: Facebook is opening its experimental predictions app to all users (1 minute read) Forecast, Facebook’s community for crowdsourced predictions and collective insights, is now available for people in the US and Canada to participate in.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-08
item.description: Minecraft is coming to PlayStation VR as a free upgrade later this month (1 minute read) Minecraft will be playable for free on PlayStation VR later this month.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-16
item.description: Barack Obama, Joe Biden, Elon Musk, Apple, and others hacked in unprecedented Twitter attack (7 minute read) Twitter accounts of some major companies and individuals were compromised in an attack that resulted in Twitter blocking new tweets from all verified users and locking all compromised accounts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-10
item.description: Google confirms new Nest smart speaker with official photo and video (1 minute read) Google has confirmed that it is working on a new Nest smart speaker.
